headline: Jim Cramer Rejects Buying First Solar on Margin
summary: First Solar, Inc. (NASDAQ:FSLR) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently looked at. headline: First Solar, Inc. (FSLR): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on First Solar, Inc. on r/Valueinvesting by u/sagotici. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on FSLR.
